citations.query: What are the colors of the icons that users touch to move the app up and remove the app respectively?
citations.raw_result:
To manage apps on the **Favorites Screen** of the **Honor Watch GS Pro**, users interact with two distinct icons:

- The **Upward Arrow Icon**, used to move an app up in the list, is a **gray circular icon** with a **white upward-pointing arrow**.
- The **Minus Sign Icon**, used to remove an app from the Favorites list, is a **red circular icon** with a **white minus sign**.

These visual cues are designed for intuitive interaction, helping users customize their quick-access menu with ease.

### References

- [1] Favorites App Management Instructions for Honor Watch GS Pro (image)
- [2] Instructional Text
- [3] Upward Arrow Icon
- [4] Minus Sign Icon
- [5] Favorites Screen
citations.source: Favorites App Management Instructions for Honor Watch GS Pro (image), Instructional Text, Upward Arrow Icon, Minus Sign Icon
citations.content: To move an app up on the Favorites Screen of the Honor Watch GS Pro, users touch a gray circular icon with a white upward-pointing arrow. To remove an app, they touch a red circular icon with a white minus sign.

Describes how users interact with the upward arrow and minus sign icons to reorder or remove apps from the Favorites list.
Specifies the gray circular background with a white upward-pointing arrow for moving apps up.
Specifies the red circular background with a white minus sign for removing apps.
